description:
Friendship management tool for VRChat


Note
VRChat is doing a staged rollout of Mutual Friends, it's currently in A/B testing. This means if you don't have access to Mutual Friends yet, you'll need to wait for VRChat to finish their rollout. Click here for more info.
Additions
- Browser crash auto-recovery (weâ€™re working on fixing the crash entirely in our next release).
- Add OpenAI support for bio translations.
- Add layout settings to mutual friends graph.
- Add status icons to social status dialog.
- Add Invalid Avatar Detection Feature, per local group favorite group #1525.
- Custom table page size in appearance settings.
Changes
- Change VRC start mode checkbox to a split-button.
- Remove "Hidden Mutual" from mutual friends graph #1528.
- Display favorite IDs for broken content.
- Gracefully close auto start apps, if they have a GUI.
- Remove unused fonts, lowering application size.
Fixes
- Material 3 fixes #1529.
- Fix date "back button" in charts tab.
- Fix inconsistent behavior when cycling through nav menu folders.
- Fix Registry Auto Backup toggles.
- Fix auto accept invite requests when using Quest in standalone mode.
Linux/macOS (Electron)
- Fix blank icon.
- Hot reload support for when building from source.
Translation Updates
@P4tr0ll
